title: Anisha Durve
cleaned_text: Bio: Dr. Anisha Durve is an Acupuncturist and Ayurvedic Practitioner graduating in 2001 from the Ayurvedic Institute after 4 years training under Dr. Vasant Lad. She is the co-author of Marma Points of Ayurveda with Dr. Lad and the founder of the Marma Institute. Location where you practice: Fort Lauderdale, Florida Services offered: Ayurvedic consultations, Marma therapy training, Acupuncture Do you offer online consultations?: Yes
